pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, March 5, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Scarborough, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit a Boys & Girls Club to discuss the impact of measures to reduce poverty and strengthen the economy, and will hold a media availability.

Boys & Girls Club of East Scarborough
100 Galloway Road

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:15 a.m.
